select h.* from scorehistory h,user u,user_role ur where h.UserCode=u.UserCode and u.UserCode=ur.UserCode and ur.RoleCode ="150" and u.Flag="0" and u.UserState="1" and h.Year=#{year} and h.Month=#{month}
